channel.title: Shard Revolution Forum Intergration Problem
channel.description:
Step 6: In your client.java where it checks for and invalid password, replace that with the code below Code: f (!checkAccount(username, password)) { returnCode = 3; // incorrect //the rest of the thing it does if you have an invalid password } MORE TO COME! Step 7: Now, providing you have followed the tutorial properly you should be ready for the final stage, download this MySQL driver Link: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=1BANCSEW Once you've downloaded the driver place it in your server directory (where run.bat is) Final Step *Updated* Editing your run.bat to run the driver Replace you run.bat with this one Code: @echo off Java -Xmx1024m -cp .;mysql-connector.jar server pause Credits: - Ultimate(me) Wrting it - James - looking at his for referenece
There's nothing like that in SHard's Client.java. Where Would I do this? Also my .bat looks like this: [code] @echo off title Game Server java -Xmx1024m -classpath bin com.rs.worldserver.Server release nogui exit [/code] I tried putting the mysql in there and it strung an error. :p

item.title: Shard Revolution Forum Intergration Problem
item.dc:creator: @Fission Fission
item.description:
@Fission wrote:

Step 6: In your client.java where it checks for and invalid password, replace that with the code below

Code:
f (!checkAccount(username, password)) {
returnCode = 3; // incorrect
//the rest of the thing it does if you have an invalid password
}
MORE TO COME!

Step 7: Now, providing you have followed the tutorial properly you should be ready for the final stage, download this MySQL driver

Link: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=1BANCSEW

Once you’ve downloaded the driver place it in your server directory (where run.bat is)

Final Step Updated Editing your run.bat to run the driver

Replace you run.bat with this one

Code:
@echo off
Java -Xmx1024m -cp .;mysql-connector.jar server
pause
Credits:

  • Ultimate(me) Wrting it
  • James - looking at his for referenece

There’s nothing like that in SHard’s Client.java. Where Would I do this?

Also my .bat looks like this:

@echo off
title Game Server
java -Xmx1024m -classpath bin com.rs.worldserver.Server release nogui
exit

I tried putting the mysql in there and it strung an error.

Read full topic
